snippet: A roomful of lawyers, many of whom represent artists worried about Spotify's royalty structure, was not the most sympathetic audience for the chief executive of the online streaming service.
abstract: A roomful of lawyers, many of whom represent artists worried about Spotify's royalty structure, was not the most sympathetic audience for the chief executive of the online streaming service.
lead_paragraph: For the music industry's movers and shakers, the parties and symposiums leading up to the Grammy Awards on Sunday night are opportunities for schmoozing, back-patting and a bit of business. But for a struggling, shrinking industry there can also be some tension, particularly when it comes to the role of technology.

headline.main: At Lawyers' Luncheon, a Chilly Reception for Spotify's Chief
